englishTranslation: In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Verily, along with every hardship is relief.
Verily, along with every hardship is relief.

arabicText: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
englishTranslation: Therefore remember Me, I will remember you, and be grateful to Me and never be ungrateful to Me.
Then which of the Blessings of your Lord will you both deny?
Say: He is Allah, the One.
Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ ذِكْرًا كَثِيرًا
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Remember Allah with much remembrance.

arabicText: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
englishTranslation: Allah burdens not a person beyond his scope.

arabicText: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
englishTranslation: And whosoever puts his trust in Allah, then He will suffice him.
Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
And your Lord said: Invoke Me, I will respond to your invocation.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Seek help in patience and the prayer. Truly, Allah is with the patient.
He said: O my Lord! Open for me my chest.

arabicText: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
englishTranslation: And We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.
And He is with you wheresoever you may be.
As for those who strive hard in Us, We will surely guide them to Our Paths.
Despair not of the Mercy of Allah.

arabicText: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslation: So do not become weak, nor be sad, and you will be superior if you are indeed believers.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
englishTranslation: Only those who are patient shall receive their reward in full, without reckoning.
